angel_threat.name: Angel Cartel Threat
angel_threat.description: Angel Cartel forces have been spotted near our trade routes. Remove them.
angel_threat.briefing: Angel Cartel has become emboldened. Show them we won't tolerate their presence here.

sansha_incursion.name: Sansha's Nation Scouts
sansha_incursion.description: Sansha's Nation has sent scouts into our territory. Eliminate them before they report back.
sansha_incursion.briefing: Sansha's Nation is probing our defenses. We must respond decisively.

rogue_drone_cleanup.name: Rogue Drone Cleanup
rogue_drone_cleanup.description: Rogue drones have infested a nearby sector. Clear them out.
rogue_drone_cleanup.briefing: These rogue drones are a menace to navigation. Exterminate them all.

exploration_site.name: Exploration Site
exploration_site.description: We've located an ancient site. Scan the area and retrieve any valuable artifacts.
exploration_site.briefing: These archaeological sites often contain valuable technology. Be thorough in your scan.

rare_ore_collection.name: Rare Ore Collection
rare_ore_collection.description: We need rare ores for a special project. Mine the specified ore from the designated asteroid belt.
rare_ore_collection.briefing: These ores are essential for our new manufacturing process. Mine carefully.

destroyer_ambush.name: Destroyer Ambush
destroyer_ambush.description: Serpentis destroyers have been ambushing our mining operations. Put a stop to it.
destroyer_ambush.briefing: These destroyers are faster and better armed than frigates. You'll need a cruiser or well-fitted destroyer.

cruiser_patrol.name: Cruiser Patrol
cruiser_patrol.description: We've detected enemy cruisers in the area. Engage and destroy.
cruiser_patrol.briefing: Cruisers are tough opponents. Make sure your ship is properly fitted before engaging.
